title: LF Ranked Players Plat+ Read Desc
body:
So atm im the lowest rating on my ranked team...Team is High Gold but literally plat players. Currently our main team is Gold 5 (end of season rush) we are smurfing at the moment just to get good strats down. 

1. Must have Skype (we all are on skype and actually quite good friends)
2. If youre a fuckwit then dont bother answering back ( plenty of plats have been kicked for being know all douchebags)
3. Preference to atleast 2 roles (currently im the only shit one with a main jg everyone else is good)
4. If in the last 20 games youve typed GG after dying once not bother replying
5. If you give up easily and dont try win a game from being far behind dont bother replying.

replies.body: I'm willing to try with your team, play mainly sup/adc/mid, gold 3 right now, have played for a long time and have skills + mature attitude.

So I'll level with you, I'm Gold and only main support, but I have great attitude, and good understanding of the game and am very keen to play in a team setting. I've given you an add, I hope you give me a chance!
Ill join, Can only play for the next 9 days tho.
